parameters.name: FEDO_H
parameters.description: FEDO-H: Omni-directional flux of HEP-H min

parameters.name: FEDU
parameters.description: [WILL NOT PLOT] Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux

parameters.name: FEDU_n
parameters.description: [WILL NOT PLOT] Unidirectional Differential Electron Flux (before noise correction)

parameters.name: FEDU_n_e2
parameters.description: ---> 73 keV Unidirectional differential electron flux (before noise correction)

parameters.name: FEDU_n_e6
parameters.description: ---> 35 keV Unidirectional differential electron flux (before noise correction)

parameters.name: FEDU_n_e10
parameters.description: ---> 17 keV Unidirectional differential electron flux (before noise correction)

parameters.name: FEDU_n_e14
parameters.description: ---> 8.4 keV Unidirectional differential electron flux (before noise correction)

parameters.name: FEEDU
parameters.description: [WILL NOT PLOT] Unidirectional Differential Electron Energy Flux

parameters.name: FEEDU_e2
parameters.description: ---> 73 keV Unidirectional differential electron energy flux

parameters.name: FEEDU_e6
parameters.description: ---> 35 keV Unidirectional differential electron energy flux

parameters.name: FEEDU_e10
parameters.description: ---> 17 keV Unidirectional differential electron energy flux

parameters.name: FEEDU_e14
parameters.description: ---> 8.4 keV Unidirectional differential electron energy flux

parameters.name: count_raw
parameters.description: [WILL NOT PLOT] Directional electron count (Noise contained)

parameters.name: FPDU
parameters.description: [CDAWeb plots not supported] Unidirectional differential proton flux

parameters.description: R, magnetic latitude, and magnetic local time of spacecraft positions (using IGRF model)

parameters.description: Spacecraft positions mapped onto the magnetic equator (using IGRF model)

parameters.description: Geographic latidue and longitude of spacecraft footprints at 100 km in the northern hemisphere (using IGRF model)

parameters.description: Magnetic field at spacecraft positions, using IGRF model

parameters.description: Magnetic field strength at spacecraft positions, using IGRF model

parameters.description: Magnetic field at spacecraft positions mapped onto the magnetic equator , using  IGRF model

parameters.description: McIlwain's L parameter for pitch angles of 30, 60, and 90deg
